slides.title: Nurturing Excellence,
slides.description: At Harohalli Educational Trust, we provide more than just education. We build the foundation for a lifetime of success and character.

slides.title: Academic Rigor,
slides.description: Join our community of learners where academic excellence meets traditional values for a brighter tomorrow.

slides.title: Holistic Development,
slides.description: Our diverse co-curricular activities ensure every child discovers their unique potential and talents.

About.title: About Us
About.trust_description: Founded with a vision to make quality education accessible to every child, Harohalli Educational Trust has been a beacon of knowledge for over 25 years. We believe in nurturing not just students, but future leaders who are ethically grounded and socially responsible.
About.trustee_desc: Led by dedicated educators and social reformers.
About.growth_desc: Focusing on physical, mental, and spiritual well-being.

schools.central_desc: Affiliated with CBSE, focusing on holistic development and modern pedagogical techniques.
schools.high_desc: Established in 1995, following the state curriculum with a strong emphasis on academic discipline.
schools.kg_desc: A playful environment for our youngest learners to Bloom and Grow.

VisionMission.title: Our Vision &
VisionMission.subtitle: Guided by our motto of "Knowledge is Power," we are committed to building a brighter future through academic excellence and personal growth.
VisionMission.vision_desc: To be a globally recognized center of education that empowers students to achieve excellence in all facets of life while maintaining strong cultural and ethical values.
VisionMission.mission_desc: To provide a nurturing environment where students are encouraged to explore their potential, develop critical thinking, and build the character necessary to serve society.

Facilities.title: Our Facilities
Facilities.subtitle: We provide a comprehensive range of facilities designed to support the academic and personal growth of our students.

items.library_desc: Vast collection of books and digital resources.
items.comp_lab_desc: State-of-the-art IT lab with high-speed internet.
items.transport_desc: Own fleet of buses covering major routes.
items.canteen_desc: Healthy and nutritious meals for students.
items.sports_desc: Facilities for indoor and outdoor sports.

Activities.title: Activities & Events
Activities.subtitle: Life at Harohalli is vibrant and full of learning opportunities. Explore the various activities that help our students discover their passions.

items.cultural_desc: Celebrating diversity through dance and music.
items.tours_desc: Learning beyond walls with educational trips.

Gallery.title: Our Gallery
Gallery.youtube_desc: Catch all the latest school events and performances live!

Registration.title: Begin Your
Registration.subtitle: Secure a seat at one of our premier institutions. Our admission process is transparent, simple, and student-focused.

steps.form_desc: Fill out our simplified online application form.
steps.interaction_desc: Join us for a campus visit and student-parent interaction.
steps.final_desc: Complete documentation and secure your future.

Registration.success_desc: Thank you for your interest. Our admissions team will contact you within 24-48 hours with the next steps.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Have questions about our schools or the admission process? Our team is here to help you. Reach out to us through any of the channels below.

Footer.mission_short: Empowering future generations through quality education and holistic development since 1995.

PUCollege.title: Mahathma PU College
PUCollege.history_desc: Mahathma Pre-University College was established in the academic year 2015-16 under the aegis of Harohalli Educational Institution. Initially offering Arts (HEGP) and Commerce (EGBA) combinations, we expanded to include Commerce with Computer Science (EBACS) in 2023-24 to meet the growing aspirations of our students.
